Arcane Protection.name: 奥法防护
Arcane Protection.description:
@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功} with arcane protection means hostile powers suffer a −2 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{减值} (−4 with a raise) to affect this character.

If the power causes harm, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{伤害} is also reduced a like amount. Arcane Protection stacks with @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-edges.7PSf45taDRsv70Df]{奥法抗性} should the recipient have both!

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): The power may affect more than one target for 1 additional @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.
Arcane Protection.trapping: Concentration, a dull glow around the protected character, a fetish

Banish.name: 放逐
Banish.description:
Banish sends entities from immaterial planes back to their native dimensions. This includes ghosts, demons, elementals, and similar beings (at the GM’s discretion).

Banishing a being is an @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{对抗投骰} of the caster’s arcane skill versus the target’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{心魂}. @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功} means the target is @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{动摇}, and each @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良} causes a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{损伤}.

If this @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{无力化} the target it returns to its native plane of existence. Banished entities may return when the Game Master feels it’s appropriate, such as the next full moon, when summoned again, or even a few rounds later if it’s a particularly powerful creature under the right conditions or in a location of power.
Banish.trapping: Holy items, arcane symbols, handful of salt

Barrier.name: 屏障
Barrier.description:
Barrier creates a straight wall 5″ (10 yards) long and 1″ (two yards) tall, of immobile material that conforms to the surface it’s cast upon. Thickness varies depending on what the wall is made of, but is usually a few inches.

The wall has a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.wY5EuZm8B3ebTBRr]{硬度} of 10, and may be destroyed as any other object (see @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.wY5EuZm8B3ebTBRr]{破坏物品}).

When the spell expires or the wall is broken it crumbles to dust or dissipates. @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.00RW2XCBWen4Ouzf]{特效} are never left behind.

Modifiers

  • Damage (+1): The barrier causes 2d4 damage to anyone who contacts it
  • Hardened (+1): The wall is @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.wY5EuZm8B3ebTBRr]{硬度} 12.
  • Shaped (+2): The barrier forms a circle, square or other basic shape.
  • Size (+1): The length and height of the barrier doubles.
Barrier.trapping: Fire, ice, thorns, force, bones, energy.

Beast Friend.name: 野兽同盟
Beast Friend.description:
This spell allows an individual to speak with and guide the actions of nature’s beasts. The cost to cast is equal to the sum of their @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.mbP0fwcquD98QtwX]{体型} (minimum 1 per creature). Controlling five @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-bestiary.8yfUpme8W5LL9RmC]{狼} (Size −1) costs 5 points (remember the minimum cost of 1), for example. Controlling a rhino (Size 5) costs 5 points.

@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功} means the creatures obey simple commands, like a well-trained dog. They attack foes and endanger their lives for their master. A @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良} on the arcane skill roll means the beasts are more obedient. They won’t kill themselves but overcome their natural fears to follow their orders.

@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-bestiary.gEli0Fp96UrC5yug]{集群} can also be controlled. Small Swarms cost 1 point, Medium Swarms cost 2, and Large Swarms cost 3.

Beast friend works only on natural creatures with animal intelligence, not humanoids, and has no effect on conjured, magical, or otherwise “unnatural” animals.

Modifiers

  • Mind Rider (+1): The caster can communicate and sense through any of the beasts they've befriended.
Beast Friend.trapping: The caster concentrates and gestures with his hands.

Blast.name: 爆发
Blast.description:
Blast launches a ball of explosive energy or matter. The area of effect is a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{中型爆散盖板}. Every target within suffers 2d6 damage, or 3d6 with a raise (see @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{范围效果攻击})

Modifiers

  • Area Effect (+0/+1): The caster can focus the blast to a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{小型爆散盖板} for no extra cost, or a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{大型爆散盖板} for +1
  • Damage (+2): The blast causes 3d6 damage (4d6 with a raise).
Blast.trapping: Balls of fire, ice, light, darkness, colored bolts, swarm of insects

Blind.name: 目盲
Blind.description:
Those affected by this malicious power suffer blurred vision or near-complete blindness with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}.

@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功} means the victim suffers a -2 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{减值} to all actions requiring sight, or -4 with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}.

The victim automatically tries to shake off the effect with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{活力} roll as a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{自由动作} at the end of his following turns. @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功} removes 2 points of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{减值}, and a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良} removes the effect entirely.

Modifiers

  • Area of Effect (+2/+3): For +2 points the power affects everyone in a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{中型爆散盖板}. For +3 points the area of effect is increased to a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{大型爆散盖板}.
  • Strong (+1): The @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{活力} roll to shake of the effect is made at -2.
Blind.trapping: Bright flash of light, sand in eyes, confusion

Bolt.name: 矢箭
Bolt.description:
Bolt sends damaging bursts of energy, streaks of holy light, or shards of matter toward one’s foes.

There are no @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.R3V40P1SzkF7ZDhB]{射程} penalties, but the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{奥法技能投骰} is affected by @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.854By7DpYevCCEfJ]{掩蔽}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.033IuoJfthTXBJ4w]{照明}, and all other usual @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{减值}.

The @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.CFL4VZDpeqKPzrqo]{伤害} of the bolt is 2d6, or 3d6 with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}.

Modifiers

  • Damage (+2): The bolt causes 3d6 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.CFL4VZDpeqKPzrqo]{伤害} (4d6 with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}).
Bolt.trapping: Fire, ice, light, darkness, colored bolts, a stream of insects

Boost/Lower Trait.name: 提升/降低特性
Boost/Lower Trait.description:
This power allows a character to increase or decrease a target’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{特性} (attribute or skill).

Boosting an ally’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{特性} increases the selected Trait one die type, or two with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}, for five rounds.

Lowering an enemy’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{特性} has a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.WaqU65ZxvBkQ0pKc]{持续时间} of Instant and lowers the selected attribute or skill a die type with @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功}, or two with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良} (to a minimum of d4). A victim automatically tries to shake off the effect with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{心魂} roll as a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{自由动作} at the end of his following turns. Success improves the effect one die type, and a raise removes the effect entirely.

Additional castings don’t stack on a single @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{特性} (take the highest), but may affect different Traits.

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): The power may affect more than one target for 1 additional @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.
  • Strong (+1): Lower Trait only. The @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{心魂} roll to shake off the effect is made at -2.

Burrow.name: 遁地
Burrow.description:
Burrow allows the recipient to meld into raw earth. He can remain underground if he wants in a sort of "limbo" or burrow through the ground at half his normal @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Xjf2D9U56qTZjBy2]{移速} (or full Pace with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}). He may not run. 

A burrowing character may attempt to suprise a foe by making an @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{对抗} @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.z9FmdFVGOOW2kufm]{潜行} versus @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.yvw9bMgsrWQXuZN2]{察觉} roll. If the burrower wins, the target is @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.vuud75GDkKL3NW10]{脆弱} to him only. With a raise, the burrower gets @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.70hkDzqDF2O662YN]{奇袭}. Targets on @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.v5io2xKJNNM0US1H]{待机} may attempt to interrupt the attack before it occurs.

Burrowers can't usually @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.ySvm7mUjCHUa1SPv]{突袭} a foe once their presence is known, but can still burrow for protection and mobility. 

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): The power may affect more than one target for 1 additional @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.
  • Power (+1): The caster can burrow through stone, concrete, or similar substances. (Some substances, like plastic, glass, solid lead, etc., might be resistant at the GM's discreation.)
Burrow.trapping: Dissolving into the earth and appearing elsewhere.

Burst.name: 爆裂
Burst.description:
Burst produces a large fan of energy that bathes its targets in red-hot fire, a cone of cold, or other damaging matter or energy.

@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功} creates a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{锥形盖板} starting at the caster and extending outward. Everything within suffers 2d6 damage (or 3d6 with a raise).

Modifiers

  • Damage (+2): The burst causes 3d6 damage, or 4d6 with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}.
Burst.trapping: A shower of flames, light or other matter of energy.

Confusion.name: 困惑
Confusion.description:
Confusion confounds a target, making him both @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.vuud75GDkKL3NW10]{分神与脆弱} if he @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{失败} a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{聪慧} roll (at -2 with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良} on the arcane skill roll). Both states are removed at the end of the victim’s next @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{回合}.

Modifiers

  • Area of Effect (+2/+3): For +2 points the power affects everyone in a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{中型爆散盖板}. For +3 points the area of effect is increased to a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{大型爆散盖板}.
Confusion.duration: Until the end of the victim's next turn
Confusion.trapping: Hypnotic lights, brief illusions, loud noises.

Damage Field.name: 致伤领域
Damage Field.description:
Damage field creates a dangerous aura around the recipient that harms foes foolish enough to get too close.

At the end of the affected character’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{回合}, all adjacent beings (including allies!) automatically take 2d4 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.CFL4VZDpeqKPzrqo]{伤害}.

Modifiers

  • Damage (+2): The damage field causes 2d6 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.CFL4VZDpeqKPzrqo]{伤害}.

Darksight.name: 暗视
Darksight.description:
Darksight allows a hero to see in the dark. With success, he ignores up to 4 points of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.033IuoJfthTXBJ4w]{照明减值}. With a raise, he ignores up to six points and can see in @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.033IuoJfthTXBJ4w]{漆黑}.

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): The power may affect more than one target for 1 additional @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.
Darksight.trapping: Glowing eyes, dilated pupils, sonic sight

Deflection.name: 偏斜
Deflection.description:
Deflection powers work in a variety of ways. Some manifestations actually deflect incoming @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.R3V40P1SzkF7ZDhB]{攻击}, others blur the target’s form or produce illusionary effects. The end result is always the same, however—to misdirect incoming melee and missile @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.R3V40P1SzkF7ZDhB]{攻击} from the recipient of the power.

Once cast, foes must subtract 2 from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.R3V40P1SzkF7ZDhB]{攻击} rolls directed at the user (or 4 with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}).

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): The power may effect more than one target for 1 additional @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.
Deflection.trapping: Mystical shield, gust of wind, phantom servant that intercepts missiles

Detect/Conceal Arcana.name: 侦测/隐藏奥法
Detect/Conceal Arcana.description:
Detect arcana allows the recipient of the power to see and detect all supernatural persons, objects, or effects in sight for five @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{轮}. This includes @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-powers.2ulSAv39yoZ7wHoH]{隐形} foes, enchantments on people or items, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.8kvWeyTI8hkg2rUW]{奇异科学} devices, and so on. With a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}, the caster knows the general type of enchantment as well — harmful, obscurement, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.DojS99YHDfEGGjV2]{魔法}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.D72xOp0RepiQBBKk]{奇迹}, etc.

Detect arcana also allows a character to ignore up to 4 points of penalties when attacking foes hidden by @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-powers.WMlJC4ALv3BKwxTP]{魔法黑暗}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-powers.2ulSAv39yoZ7wHoH]{隐形}, or similar abilities (or all @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{减值} with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}).

Conceal arcana prevents detection of arcane energies on one being or item of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.mbP0fwcquD98QtwX]{正常尺寸} for one hour.

Detect vs. Conceal: Detecting arcana against someone or something that’s been concealed is an @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{对抗投骰} of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奥法技能} (roll each time it’s attempted, but no more than once per turn). If the concealment wins, the character cannot see through the ruse with this casting, but may terminate this instance and try again.

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): The power may affect more than one viewer for detect, or item for conceal, for 1 additional @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.
  • Area of Effect (+1/+2): Conceal only. The power effects everything in a sphere the size of a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{中型爆散盖板} for +1 points, or a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{大型爆散盖板} for +2
  • Strong (+1): Conceal only. @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{侦测投骰} to see through the concealment are made at -2.

Disguise.name: 易容
Disguise.description:
Disguise allows the target to assume the appearance of another person of the same @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.mbP0fwcquD98QtwX]{体型} and shape, including clothing. It does not confer any abilities, however.

Those who have reason to question the imposter’s identity make a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.yvw9bMgsrWQXuZN2]{察觉} roll at -2 to see through the disguise (-4 with a raise on the casting roll). This is a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{自由动作}.

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): The power may affect more than one target for 1 additional @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.
  • Size (+1): The recipient may assume the shape of someone up to two @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.mbP0fwcquD98QtwX]{体型} larger or smaller than themselves.
Disguise.trapping: Malleable features, illusionary appearance, hair of new form

Dispel.name: 破袪
Dispel.description:
Dispel allows a hero to negate enemy powers. It has no effect on permanent enchantments or innate abilities such as a dragon’s breath or a banshee’s scream. Dispel affects @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.7zIdCwllZmfEDagf]{奥法装置} normally.

Dispel can be used on a power already in effect or to counter an enemy power as it’s being used. The latter requires the countering mage to be on @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.v5io2xKJNNM0US1H]{待机} and interrupt his foe’s action.

In either case, dispelling an opponent’s power is an @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{对抗投骰} of arcane skills (with a -2 modifier if the rival’s power is of another type such as magic vs. miracles, psionics vs. weird science, etc.).

If the dispelling character wins, the targeted power ends immediately (or fails if it was countered with the usual results of failure). With a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}, the recipient of the dispelled power is also @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.vuud75GDkKL3NW10]{分神}.  

Modifiers

  • Power (+1): For +1 Power Point, dispel can disrupt @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.7zIdCwllZmfEDagf]{附魔装置} for one round, or two with a raise. The difficulty to do is -2 for permanently enchanted items such as found in most swords & sorcery campaigns, or -4 for divine or legendary relics.

Divination.name: 预言
Divination.description:
Divination allows the caster to contact otherworldly beings or forces to gain information.

Preparing the spell takes one uninterrupted minute, and must be done at a site relevant to the spirit being contacted. If speaking with a ghost, for example, the conversation should occur at its grave, where it was killed, or with a personal object in hand. Oracles may only be engaged at temples, fire spirits near open flames, and so on.

After the preparation time is complete, the caster makes her arcane skill roll. @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功} allows her to engage with the spirit and ask it any questions she might have. The entity must answer to the best of its ability, as directly or ambiguously as the Game Master feels fits the spirit’s personality and the feel of her campaign. A @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良} means the spirit is more helpful, knowledgeable, or direct than usual (whether it wants to be or not). The type of entity contacted determines how it communicates. Spirits in the netherworld tend to know only those things pertinent to their life and death—and they may not even know the identity of their killer if the person was masked or unseen.

Likewise, nature spirits know only about their local environs, demons know only about the affairs they’re directly involved in, and so on. The Game Master must decide what the entity knows based on its background, origin, and personality. Once a spirit has been conversed with it may not be contacted again for 24 hours. The Game Master may extend this to a community of spirits in a single place, such as water spirits in a babbling brook or nameless spirits in a mass grave.
Divination.duration: A brief conversation of about five minutes

Drain Power Points.name: 抽取奇术点
Drain Power Points.description:
Powerful mages, priests, psykers, and the like can use this ability to drain arcane energy from their foes. They can sometimes even leech the stolen energy for themselves.

The power is @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{对抗} by the target’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{心魂}, and the caster suffers a -2 penalty to her roll if the target has a different @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奥法背景} than her own.

@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功} drains 1d6 of the rival’s Power Points (if any, and the die doesn’t ace). With a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}, the caster adds the points to her own. This may take her above her usual maximum! They last until used, and must be the first spent when casting.

Drain Power Points can also be used on an @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.7zIdCwllZmfEDagf]{奥法装置} (the creator still resists with her arcane skill whether she wields it or not). The device can’t lose more @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{获得奇术点} than it has.

Elemental Manipulation.name: 元素操纵
Elemental Manipulation.description:
This power grants basic control over the four traditional elements: air, earth, fire, and water (the elements may vary depending on the setting). The power acts as if it has a d6 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{力量}, or d8 with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}.

Here are some ideas for what each element can do. Each is an action.

  • Air: Push someone, blow out a torch, fan a flame, cool someone down (+2 to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.1oKkC3l4rDrKX6ZB]{疲乏} rolls in oppressive heat).
  • Earth: Move a square foot of earth (half that in stone) each @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{轮}, cover tracks.
  • Fire: Conjure flame about the size of a torch, hurl a small blast of fire at someone (Str damage), spread existing flame (see @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.6cgunuVilk355mfE]{火焰}).
  • Water: Conjure a quart of water (not "inside" objects or people), purify a gallon of water per casting.

Empathy.name: 共感
Empathy.description:
The caster forms an emotional bond between himself and the target with a successful @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奥法技能} vs @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{心魂} roll. He knows the target’s emotional state and most basic surface  thoughts, and gains +1 (+2 with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}) to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.RrgAZp50CgQyyY6w]{威吓}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.xOmuCR92Ys9jD5vg]{交涉}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.SJ1nN0CmOHNQhfOQ]{表演}, or @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.tjzr8dGPHLLWZdRI]{嘲弄} rolls against him.

Empathy also works on animals, adding +2 to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.DHKzenDEPdjw3X2u]{骑乘} or other rolls used to interact with the creature .
Empathy.trapping: Concentration, a warm or sympathetic smile, exchanging a pleasantry

Entangle.name: 纠缠
Entangle.description:
Entangle allows the caster to restrain a target with ice, bands of energy, or other vine-like @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.00RW2XCBWen4Ouzf]{特效} (@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.wY5EuZm8B3ebTBRr]{硬度} 5). If successful, the target is @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.sTArFBzbesQkjLVg]{纠缠}. With a raise, he’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.sTArFBzbesQkjLVg]{束缚}.

Victims may break free on their turn as detailed under @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.sTArFBzbesQkjLVg]{束缚与纠缠}.

Modifiers

  • Area of Effect (+2/+3): For +2 points the power affects everyone in a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{中型爆散盖板}. For +3 points the area of effect is increased to a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{大型爆散盖板}.
  • Strong (+2): The entangling material is particularly resilient. Rolls to break free are made at -2 and its @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.wY5EuZm8B3ebTBRr]{硬度} increases to 7

Environmental Protection.name: 环境防护
Environmental Protection.description:
Adventurers sometimes travel beneath the waves, in space, or other hazardous environments. This power protects them from crushing depths, scathing heat, intense cold, and even radiation.

Environmental protection allows the target to breathe, speak, and move at his normal @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Xjf2D9U56qTZjBy2]{移速} in an otherwise fatal environment. It protects him against intense @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Kplm6UYMEXdGekjG]{高温}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.54JSAfwYsPQLtuBb]{寒冷}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.S3WKO4LbfvERka9n]{辐射}, atmospheric or fluid pressure, and lack of oxygen. Generally, the adventurer can function normally underwater, in space, within the cone of a volcano, etc. It fails quickly (1d4 rounds) in the presence of super-intense conditions such as actual lava or the massive radiation of a melting nuclear core, for example.

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): The power may affect more than one target for 1 additional @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.
Environmental Protection.trapping: A mark on the forehead, potions, gills.

Farsight.name: 远视
Farsight.description:
Farsight allows the recipient to see in detail over great distances. She can read lips or read fine print up to a mile distant.

With a raise, she also halves @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.W0tCWhgTtmkp05G3]{射程减值} for @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.sOHfVvBDhe3Oy3r1]{射击}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.sAig03GZiFKqBX7p]{运动} (throwing), or other abilities affected by @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.R3V40P1SzkF7ZDhB]{射程}.

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): The power may affect more than one target for 1 additional @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.
Farsight.trapping: Invisibly marked targets, guiding winds, eagle eyes

Fear.name: 恐惧
Fear.description:
This power causes overwhelming dread and horror. The affected make a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0kDGRsQ4SHyweFRc]{恐惧} roll. @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.dwBaTVL82DAN7GRe]{龙套} who fail are @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-tables.Fear Table]{恐慌} and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.dwBaTVL82DAN7GRe]{不羁角色} roll on the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-macros.Fear Table]{恐惧表}. If the power is cast with a raise, the Fear roll is at -2 and Wild Cards add +2 to Fear Table results.

Modifiers

  • Area of Effect (+2/+3): For +2 points the power affects everyone in a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{中型爆散盖板}. For +3 poitns the area of effect is increased to a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{大型爆散盖板}.

Fly.name: 飞行
Fly.description:
Fly allows a character to soar at @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Xjf2D9U56qTZjBy2]{移速} 12″, or twice that with a raise (he may not @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Xjf2D9U56qTZjBy2]{奔跑}).

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+2): The power may affect more than one target for 2 additional @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{获得奇术点} each.

Growth/Shrink.name: 放大/缩小
Growth/Shrink.description:
Growth increases the recipient’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.mbP0fwcquD98QtwX]{体型} by 1 for every 2 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{获得奇术点} spent. Each increase in Size grants the target a one-step increase to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{力量} and 1 point of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.oeIvsyAk9MhWmngX]{坚韧}. This does not increase @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.dwBaTVL82DAN7GRe]{损伤} regardless of change to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.mbP0fwcquD98QtwX]{尺寸}.

Shrink reduces the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.mbP0fwcquD98QtwX]{体型} of the subject one step for every 2 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{获得奇术点} spent to a maximum of Size -2 (approximately the size of a cat). Each step reduced decreases @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{力量} one die type (minimum of d4) and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.oeIvsyAk9MhWmngX]{坚韧} by 1 (minimum of 2).

For unwilling targets, the caster’s arcane skill roll is @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{对抗} by @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{心魂}.

Havoc.name: 劫动
Havoc.description:
This ability creates chaos and mischief for all those within its area of effect, hurling debris and rivals in all directions.

With success, the caster places a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{中型爆散盖板} anywhere within @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.W0tCWhgTtmkp05G3]{射程}, or a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{锥形盖板} emanating from the caster.

Anyone touched by the template is @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.vuud75GDkKL3NW10]{分神} and must then make a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{力量} roll (at -2 if the caster got a raise). Those who fail are hurled 2d6″—directly away from the caster if using the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{锥形盖板} or directly away from the center if using a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{爆散盖板} (the caster chooses for those in the dead center).

Victims who strike a hard object (such as a wall) take 2d4 damage (@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.E6dvwuYSbV40p7Y5]{非致命} unless it’s a spiked wall or other more dangerous hazard).

Airborne Targets: Flying or airborne targets suffer an additional -2 to their @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{力量} rolls as they have no ground to brace themselves on.

Modifiers

  • Area Effect (+1): Havoc affects a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-powers.kIIyZffgmjUfmixH]{大型爆散盖板}.
  • Strong (+1): @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{力量} rolls are made at -2

Healing.name: 医疗
Healing.description:
Healing removes @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{损伤} less than an hour old. A @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功} removes one Wound, and a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良} removes two. The power may be cast additional times to remove additional Wounds within that hour and as long as the healer has enough @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{获得奇术点}.

For @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.dwBaTVL82DAN7GRe]{龙套}, the GM must first determine if the ally is still alive (see @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Dc50EUXxlsJl7sph]{后果}). If so, a successful arcane skill roll returns the ally to action (@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{动摇} if it matters).

Modifiers

  • Greater Healing (+10): Greater healing can restore any @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{损伤}, including those more than an hour old.
  • Crippling Injuries (+20): The power can heal a permanent @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-tables.j8vJlMyE29U7o6Kz]{严重伤害} (see @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{无力化}). This requires an hour of preparation and only one casting is permitted per injury. If it @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{失败}, this caster cannot heal that particular injury (but somoene else may try). If successful, the subject is @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.1oKkC3l4rDrKX6ZB]{力竭} for 24 hours.
  • Neutralize Poison or Disease (+1): A successful healing roll negates any @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.492TZ3ZhWD452C3O]{毒素} or @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.5n806Gfv7FpIbpWh]{疾病}. If the poison or disease has a bonus or penalty associated with it, the modifier applies to the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奥法技能} roll as well.
Healing.trapping: Laying on hands, touching the victim with a holy symbol, prayer

Illusion.name: 幻象
Illusion.description:
Illusion can be used to create a visual scene or replica of most anything the caster can imagine, but it is silent, intangible, and incapable of affecting the real world. For example, illusionary weapons pass through foes, one cannot sit in an illusionary chair, and an illusionary dog has no audible bark.

Those who contact an illusion or doubt it’s real make a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{聪慧} roll as a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{自由动作} (at -2 if the power was activated with a raise). If @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功}, that individual is no longer subject to this casting.

The GM should make @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{团队投骰} for @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.dwBaTVL82DAN7GRe]{龙套} as they point out the illusion’s inconsistencies to each other.

The volume of the illusion must fit within a sphere the size of a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{中型爆散盖板} (4″ or eight yards in diameter).

Modifiers

  • Sound (+1): The power generates sound appropriate to the Illusion. Illusionary allies may talk, illusionary crows caw, and so on. It may not mask or mute existing sound, however. 
  • Strong (+2): @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{聪慧} rolls to disbelieve the illusion are made at -2.

Intangibility.name: 无形
Intangibility.description:
With a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功} @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奥法技能} roll, whoever receives this power becomes incorporeal. He is unable to affect the physical world, and it cannot affect him. He can travel through walls, and non-magical weapons pass straight through him. Any items carried at the time of casting are also incorporeal.

While incorporeal, the character may affect other incorporeal beings (including himself), and he is still susceptible to supernatural attacks, including @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.WaqU65ZxvBkQ0pKc]{奇术} and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.7zIdCwllZmfEDagf]{附魔物品}. The being becomes corporeal when the power ends, but if within someone or something he’s shunted to the nearest open space and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.8uKLqZANf1Mwlyb3]{震慑}.

If cast on an unwilling target, the victim @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{抵抗} with @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{心魂}.
Intangibility.trapping: Ghost form, body of shadow, gaseous transformation

Invisibility.name: 隐形
Invisibility.description:
With a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功}, the character and his personal items are transparent except for a vague blur or outline. Any @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{动作} taken against him that requires sight is made at -4, or -6 with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}. The same penalty applies to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.yvw9bMgsrWQXuZN2]{察觉} rolls to detect the unseen presence.

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+3): The power may affect more than one target for 3 additional @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{获得奇术点} each.

Light / Darkness.name: 光亮/黑暗
Light / Darkness.description:
Light creates bright @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.033IuoJfthTXBJ4w]{照明} in a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{大型爆散盖板}. With a raise, the light can be focused into a 5″ (10 yard) beam as well.

Darkness blocks @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.033IuoJfthTXBJ4w]{照明} in an area the size of a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{大型爆散盖板}, making the area Dark, or Pitch Darkness with a raise (see @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.033IuoJfthTXBJ4w]{照明}).

If light and darkness overlap, they create a patch of Dim light (-2).

Modifiers

  • Mobile (+1): The caster can move the area of effect up to his @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奥法技能} die type each @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{轮} after casting, or attach it to an inanimate object when first cast.
Light / Darkness.trapping: Illusionary torch, sunlight, darkness, thick fogs

Mind Link.name: 心灵链接
Mind Link.description:
Mind link creates a telepathic connection between two individuals (which does not necessarily have to include the caster). The link accommodates only willing subjects and communication—thoughts that aren’t consciously transmitted aren’t relayed.

Once @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{启动}, the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.W0tCWhgTtmkp05G3]{射程} between all linked minds is one mile, or five with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}.

If any of the linked characters suffers a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{损伤}, all others must make a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{聪慧} roll or be @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{动摇} (this cannot cause a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{损伤}).

The speed of communication is that of normal speech, but with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良} members may communicate up to 30 seconds or so of speech on a single combat turn.

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): The power may affect additional individuals for 1 additonal @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.
Mind Link.trapping: Headpieces, talismans, of Tao or other gods, crystals

Mind Reading.name: 读心
Mind Reading.description: Mind reading is an @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{对抗投骰} versus the target’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{聪慧}. @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功} allows the character to gain one truthful answer from the subject. The target is aware of the mental intrusion unless the mind reader gets a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}. The GM may apply @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{调整值} based on the subject’s mental @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.YIVrT8boWKDw8ZEz]{负赘} or current state of mind.

Mind Wipe.name: 心智抹除
Mind Wipe.description:
Mind wipe removes a target’s memories, a terrible violation in most civilized societies. The power is @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{对抗} by a victim’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{聪慧} and requires a full minute of mental struggle. The victim must be conscious during this time, so if not restrained he can simply move out of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.W0tCWhgTtmkp05G3]{射程}.

If @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功}, the victim forgets a single event (up to about 30 minutes of time). A @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良} removes a complex memory of several hours.

If the defender wins, the caster cannot affect him with mind wipe for 24 hours. (Others may reattempt the power, however.)

The memory remains missing but strong evidence that challenges its “logic” allows a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{聪慧} roll at -2 to remember fragments determined by the GM.

Modifiers

  • Edit (+1): Instead of wiping the memory, the caster edits it as she sees fit.
  • Fast Cast (+2): The caster can wipe a memory as an @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{动作}.
Mind Wipe.trapping: A noxious drink, parasites, touching the target's temples

Object Reading.name: 读物
Object Reading.description:
Object reading is the ability to see the past of an inanimate object, discovering who held it, where it’s been, and what it might have been used for. The object has no sentience of its own — the caster simply sees and hears visions of the past that took place in its presence.

@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功} allows the character to see events that occurred within 10 yards up to about five years past. A @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良} increases this to 100 years and 20 yards. The caster can “fast forward” and “rewind” as desired, skimming about 10 years of history per minute of real time.

When watching an actual event, it occurs in real time, just as if watching a digital video.

Modifiers

  • Strong (+2): The caster can see or hear from the item's creation forward.

Protection.name: 防护
Protection.description:
Protection creates a field of energy or armor around a character, giving him 2 points of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.jLuL7VxHiVRDqOHO]{护甲}, or +4 with a raise.

Whether the protection is visible or not depends on the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.00RW2XCBWen4Ouzf]{特效}—this is entirely up to the caster.

Protection stacks with all other armor, natural or worn, and is negated by @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.qCSFAFystY0tUi2k]{穿甲} as usual.

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): The power may affect additional targets at a cost of 1 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.
  • More Armor (+1): Success grants 4 points of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.jLuL7VxHiVRDqOHO]{护甲} (+6 with a raise).
  • Toughness (+1): Armor provides Toughness instead of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.jLuL7VxHiVRDqOHO]{护甲} and is not affected by @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.qCSFAFystY0tUi2k]{穿甲} (magical or otherwise).
Protection.trapping: A mystical glow, hardened skin, ethereal armor, a mass of nanites

Puppet.name: 傀儡
Puppet.description:
Puppet is an @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{对抗投骰} of the character’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奥法技能} versus the target’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{心魂}. With @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功}, the victim automatically obeys commands that don’t directly harm himself or those he cares about.

With a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}, the target is completely controlled, but gets an automatic @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{心魂} roll as a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{自由动作} to avoid directly harming himself or those he cares about. If the puppet’s resistance @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功}, he doesn’t carry out that particular command but doesn’t otherwise resist his master. With a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}, he breaks the controller’s hold and the power ends.

Commands are general, such as “attack that person” or “open that door.” The controller doesn’t get to dictate how many @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{动作} the victim uses in a turn, whether or not he uses his @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-edges.BnYCof561WlKFJFY]{横扫} Edge, etc.

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+2): The caster may affect others at the cost of 2 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{获得奇术点} each.
Puppet.trapping: Glowing eyes, trance-like state, a swinging pocket watch, voodoo dolls.

Relief.name: 缓和
Relief.description:
Relief removes one @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.1oKkC3l4rDrKX6ZB]{疲乏} level, or two with a raise. It can also remove a character’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{动摇} status, and removes @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.8uKLqZANf1Mwlyb3]{震慑} status with a raise.

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): The power may affect more than one target for 1 additional @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.

Resurrection.name: 复生
Resurrection.description:
Perhaps the greatest power of all is the ability to bring someone back from the dead. It can restore lost loves, bring solace to the grieving, and topple kingdoms.

Returning the dead to life requires a reasonably complete corpse no more than a year old. The caster then prays, meditates, chants, or otherwise concentrates on mending the body and pulling the spirit back to it for four hours.

Once done, the healer makes a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{施法投骰} at -8. If successful, the victim returns to life with three @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{损伤} and is @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.1oKkC3l4rDrKX6ZB]{力竭}. With a raise, she returns merely @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.1oKkC3l4rDrKX6ZB]{力竭}.

Modifiers

  • Power (+5): The hero can raise a spirit dead up to a decade for +5 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{获得奇术点}.
Resurrection.trapping: Elaborate ceremonies, rare plants, magical amulets, divine intervention

Shape Change.name: 化形
Shape Change.description:
Many cultures have legends of shamans or wizards who take on the shape of animals.

This power does just that, allowing the caster to take the form of any animal (including fantastic creatures such as @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-bestiary.wV6VO85iyVipvzDF]{龙} and hippogriffs if they exist in that setting, but not humanoids, undead, etc). What a character can change into depends on his @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.8K846v4GhQDRpbO8]{位阶}:

Shape Change
Cost Rank Size
3 入门 Size -4 to Size -1
5 Seasoned Size 0
8 Veteran Size 1 to 2
11 Heroic Size 3 to 4
15 Legendary Size 5 to 10

With a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良} on the roll, the character transforms into a  particularly large version of its type—increase its @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{力量} and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{活力} by one die type each.

Weapons and other personal effects are assumed into the animal’s form and reappear when the power ends, but other objects are dropped.

While transformed, the character retains his own @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{聪慧}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{心魂}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.YIVrT8boWKDw8ZEz]{负赘}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.S1oyWoM8sUgiazxK]{专长}, and linked @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{技能} (though he may not be able to use some or all of them depending on the form -- GM’s call). He gains the animal’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{灵巧}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{力量}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{活力}, and linked @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{技能} and cannot use devices that require humanoid form. He has no capacity for speech and cannot activate @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.WaqU65ZxvBkQ0pKc]{奇术}, though he may continue to maintain powers previously active.

A @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.BrNK7u9mflAdnHzp]{生物的} natural abilities inherent to its form are conferred, but magical ones aren’t. A @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-bestiary.wV6VO85iyVipvzDF]{龙} can fly and breathe fire in a traditional fantasy setting, for example, so a character who shape changes into one may do so as well. If dragons also cast spells in that world, however, shape change would not grant that ability because it’s not inherent to the physical form.

Size: The caster does not inherit extra @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.dwBaTVL82DAN7GRe]{损伤} when transforming into creatures of Large or Huge @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.mbP0fwcquD98QtwX]{尺寸}.

Modifiers

  • Speech (+1): The recipient retains the power of speech (but still cannot activate @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.WaqU65ZxvBkQ0pKc]{奇术}).

Sloth/Speed.name: 滞缓/加速
Sloth/Speed.description:
Sloth lessens celerity and coordination while speed increases it. It halves the target’s total @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Xjf2D9U56qTZjBy2]{移动} each @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{轮} (round up). With a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}, movement is also an @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{动作}. The target automatically attempts to shake off the effects of sloth at the end of each of his next turns by making a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{心魂} roll.

@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功} with speed doubles the target’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Xjf2D9U56qTZjBy2]{移动} (basic Pace and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Xjf2D9U56qTZjBy2]{奔跑}). With a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良} the character also ignores the -2 running penalty.

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): Speed only. The power may affect more than one target for 1 additional @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.
  • Area of Effect (+2/+3): Sloth only. For +2 points the power affects everyone in a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{中型爆散盖板}. For +3 poitns the area of efect is increased to a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{大型爆散盖板}.
  • Quickness (+2): Speed only. The character's total @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.jqSZFF6nkgnFPVRr]{复合动作} penalty each turn is reduced by 2 (she can do two actions at no penalty, or three at -2 each).
  • Strong (+1): Sloth only. The @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{心魂} roll to shake off sloth's effects is made at -2.
Sloth/Speed.trapping: Slowing time, blurred motion, a slippery patch of oil or ice

Slumber.name: 沉眠
Slumber.description:
Those who favor stealth or want to avoid harming their foes are drawn to this spell, which puts its victims into a deep and restful sleep.

Anyone affected by slumber must make a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{心魂} roll (at -2 if the caster got a raise on her @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奥法技能} roll). Those who fail fall asleep for the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.WaqU65ZxvBkQ0pKc]{持续时间} of the spell. Very loud noises or attempts to physically wake a sleeper (by shaking him, for example), grant another @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{心魂} roll.

Modifiers

  • Area of Effect (+2/+3): For +2 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{点} the power affects everyone in a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{中型爆散盖板}. For +3 points the area of effect is increased to a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{大型爆散盖板}.
Slumber.trapping: A lullaby, blowing powder or sand at targets

Smite.name: 痛击
Smite.description:
This power is cast on a weapon of some sort. If it’s a ranged weapon, it affects one entire magazine, 20 bolts, shells, or arrows, or one full “load” of ammunition (the GM determines the exact quantity for unusual weapons). While the power is in effect, the weapon’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.CFL4VZDpeqKPzrqo]{伤害} is increased by +2, or +4 with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}.

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): The power may affect more than one target for 1 additional @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.
Smite.trapping: A colored glow, runes, sigils, crackling energy, barbs grow from the blade

Sound/Silence.name: 发声/沉默
Sound/Silence.description:
Sound mimics any known sound or voice, emanating from a point of origin within @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.W0tCWhgTtmkp05G3]{射程} at a volume up to the sound of a loud shout. If used as a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.2aAyYC6n07MrZ47O]{考验}, the defender @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{对抗} the casting roll with @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{聪慧}.

Silence does the opposite, muting all sound up to a loud shout within a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{大型爆散盖板}. This subtracts 4 from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.yvw9bMgsrWQXuZN2]{察觉} rolls made by those inside the area of effect, as well as anyone trying to hear sounds made from within. A @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良} completely mutes all sound inside the template—such @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.yvw9bMgsrWQXuZN2]{察觉} rolls automatically fail.

Modifiers

  • Mobile (+1): The caster can move the area of effect up to his @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奥法技能} die type each @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{轮}.
  • Targeted (+0): Instead of casting silence in an @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{范围效果}, the caster may instead target individuals in @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.W0tCWhgTtmkp05G3]{射程} for 1 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each. Unwilling targets resist with @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{心魂} (at -2 if the caster gets a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}).
Sound/Silence.trapping: Magical effects, a brief ripple in the air, a bell or chime that starts or stops ringing

Speak Language.name: 通晓语言
Speak Language.description:
This power allows a character to speak, read, and write a sapient language other than his own. A @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良} on the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奥法技能} roll allows the user to appropriately use and understand slang and dialect as well.

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): The power may affect more than one target for 1 additional @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.

Stun.name: 震慑
Stun.description:
Stun shocks a target with concussive force, sound, light, magical energy, or the like.

A @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功} casting means the victim must make a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{活力} roll (at -2 with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良} on the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奥法技能} roll) or be @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.8uKLqZANf1Mwlyb3]{震慑}.

Modifiers

  • Area of Effect (+2/+3): For +2 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{点} the power affects everyone in a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{中型爆散盖板}. For +3 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{点} the area of effect is increased to a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.xxEcWExtn36PPxg0]{大型爆散盖板}.
Stun.trapping: Bolts of energy, stun bombs, sonic booms, burst of blinding light

Summon Ally.name: 召唤盟友
Summon Ally.description:
This power allows the character to summon a magical servant from nothing. The ally typically takes the form of a basic humanoid of the appropriate @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.mbP0fwcquD98QtwX]{体型} but can appear differently based on the caster’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.00RW2XCBWen4Ouzf]{特效}. It materializes anywhere in @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.W0tCWhgTtmkp05G3]{射程}, and with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良} on the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奥法技能} roll, it’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0FTf4A5NTcWmTBdP]{强韧}) as well.

The ally acts on its creator’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Kz7Q7UI3Wnk8wIwr]{行动卡} and follows her commands to the best of its ability. It has no personality, creativity, or emotions. When the power ends or the ally is @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{无力化}, it fades into nothingness, leaving no trace behind.

The type of servant that can be summoned depends on the caster’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.8K846v4GhQDRpbO8]{位阶}. With the GM’s approval, the player may swap abilities. If a hero wants an attendant in the form of a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-bestiary.8yfUpme8W5LL9RmC]{狼}, for example, the caster might exchange the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.sOHfVvBDhe3Oy3r1]{射击} skill for @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.15aEAJjDEjQy4fHF]{生存} so that the “animal” can track its foes.

SUMMON ALLY
Rank Cost Servant
入门 2 Attendant
Seasoned 4 Bodyguard
Veteran 6 Mirror Self*
Heroic 8 Sentinel

*Mirror Self costs +2 power points per Rank above Veteran to a maximum of 10 PPs at Legendary

Modifiers

  • Bite/Claw (+1):  The ally can bite or claw at Str+d6
  • Flight (+2): The ally can fly at @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Xjf2D9U56qTZjBy2]{移速} 12
  • Mind Rider (+1): The caster can communicate and sense through the ally.

 

STATBLOCKS

Attendant

Attributes: Agility d4, Smarts d4, Spirit d4, Strength d4, Vigor d4
Skills: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.sAig03GZiFKqBX7p]{运动} d4, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.wWiwjPlzAQU3TN9l]{格斗} d4, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.yvw9bMgsrWQXuZN2]{察觉} d4, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.sOHfVvBDhe3Oy3r1]{射击} d4, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.z9FmdFVGOOW2kufm]{潜行} d6
Pace: 4; Parry: 4; Toughness: 4
Special Abilities:

  • Claw: Str+d4.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.cRxFUxCIqFobCzBU]{构装体}: +2 to recover from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{动摇}; ignore 1 point of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{损伤减值}; doesn’t breathe, immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.492TZ3ZhWD452C3O]{毒素} and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.5n806Gfv7FpIbpWh]{疾病}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.PB0IgKbXwake0R3d]{无畏}: Immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0kDGRsQ4SHyweFRc]{恐惧} and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.RrgAZp50CgQyyY6w]{威吓}.

 

Bodyguard

Attributes: Agility d6, Smarts d4, Spirit d6, Strength d6, Vigor d6
Skills: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.sAig03GZiFKqBX7p]{运动} d6, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.wWiwjPlzAQU3TN9l]{格斗} d6, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.RrgAZp50CgQyyY6w]{威吓} d6, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.yvw9bMgsrWQXuZN2]{察觉} d4, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.sOHfVvBDhe3Oy3r1]{射击} d4, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.z9FmdFVGOOW2kufm]{潜行} d4
Pace: 6; Parry: 5; Toughness: 7 (2)
Edges: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-edges.4ue5lRCW1toPyzWO]{先发制人}
Gear: Melee attack (Str+d6).
Special Abilities:

  • Armor +2: Hardened skin.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.cRxFUxCIqFobCzBU]{构装体}: See Attendant.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.PB0IgKbXwake0R3d]{无畏}: Immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0kDGRsQ4SHyweFRc]{恐惧} and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.RrgAZp50CgQyyY6w]{威吓}.

 

Mirror Self
The ally is a clone of the caster except: it’s an @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.dwBaTVL82DAN7GRe]{龙套}; it has the same number of current @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{获得奇术点} as the caster after subtracting for this casting; it cannot use the summon ally power; its @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{技能} (but not @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{属性}) are one die type less (minimum d4) than the original; it has identical mundane equipment (no magical qualities, disappears when the power expires); has the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.cRxFUxCIqFobCzBU]{构装体} and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.PB0IgKbXwake0R3d]{无畏} abilities.

 

Sentinel
Attributes: Agility d6, Smarts d6, Spirit d8, Strength d12+2, Vigor d10
Skills: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.sAig03GZiFKqBX7p]{运动} d6, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.wWiwjPlzAQU3TN9l]{格斗} d10, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.RrgAZp50CgQyyY6w]{威吓} d10, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.yvw9bMgsrWQXuZN2]{察觉} d8

Edges: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-edges.7PSf45taDRsv70Df]{奥法抗性}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-edges.m6Dq7S2wLN28Ebk0]{横扫 (精通)}.
Gear: Melee attack (Str+d8).
Special Abilities:

  • Armor +4: Stone skin.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.cRxFUxCIqFobCzBU]{构装体}: See Attendant.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.PB0IgKbXwake0R3d]{无畏}: Immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0kDGRsQ4SHyweFRc]{恐惧} and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.RrgAZp50CgQyyY6w]{威吓}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.mbP0fwcquD98QtwX]{体型} 2: Sentinels are 8' tall and very dense.
Summon Ally.trapping: Clay figure that grows into a servant, a tattoo that comes to life.

Telekinesis.name: 念动
Telekinesis.description:
Telekinesis is the ability to move objects or creatures (including oneself) with arcane will. It has a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{力量} of d10, or d12 with a raise.

Unwilling opponents resist the caster’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奥法技能} with an @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{对抗} @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{心魂} roll when targeted and at the start of each of their @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{回合} afterward until they’re released. They can be moved up to the caster’ @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{聪慧} per turn in any direction, and can be bashed into walls, ceilings, or other obstacles for Str+d6 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.CFL4VZDpeqKPzrqo]{伤害}. Dropped creatures suffer @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.KrNAAJXr91wkfxtY]{坠落伤害} as usual.

Telekinetic Tools: A caster can wield tools (including weapons) with telekinesis as an action. Use the caster’s relevant @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{技能} when attacking in this way (not his @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奥法技能}).
Telekinesis.trapping: A wave of the hand, magic wand, steely gaze

Teleport.name: 传送
Teleport.description:
Teleport allows a character to disappear and instantly reappear up to 12″ (24 yards) distant, or double that with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}. Teleporting to an unseen location incurs a -2 penalty on the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奥法技能} roll.

Opponents adjacent to a character who teleports away don’t get a free attack (see @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.qfAkQVB9LbFFdDQ3]{撤出近战}).

If casting teleport on a willing subject, the caster decides where they move to, not the target.

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): The power may affect more than one target for 1 additional @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.
  • Teleport Foe (+2): Foes may be targeted by a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.IzrUxDIcUsSdJabI]{接触攻击}. This is an @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{动作}, so the casting must be the second part of a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.jqSZFF6nkgnFPVRr]{复合动作} if the attack is successful. The foe resists the casting with an @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{对抗} Spirit roll against the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.nCyMogSOG0nWNDTb]{奥法技能} total and is sent up to the 12" away with success and 24" with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}. Foes may not be teleported into solid objects.
Teleport.trapping: A cloud of smoke, "phasing" out, change into a bolt of lightning

Wall Walker.name: 走壁
Wall Walker.description:
Wall walker allows the recepient to walk on vertical or horizontal surfaces. With @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功}, she moves at half her normal @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Xjf2D9U56qTZjBy2]{移速}. With a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}, she may move at full @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Xjf2D9U56qTZjBy2]{移速} and even @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Xjf2D9U56qTZjBy2]{奔跑}.

If forced to make an @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.sAig03GZiFKqBX7p]{运动} roll to climb or hang on to the a surface, she adds +4 to the total.

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): The caster may affect others at the cost of 1 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.
Wall Walker.trapping: Spider-like visage, prickly hairs on hands and feet

Warrior's Gift.name: 天赐勇武
Warrior's Gift.description:
With a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{成功} @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奥法技能} roll, the recipient gains the benefits of a single Combat @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.S1oyWoM8sUgiazxK]{专长 chosen by the caster. The caster (not the recipient) must have the same @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.8K846v4GhQDRpbO8]{位阶} or higher as the Edge’s Requirements. With a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良}, the recipient gains the Improved version of the Edge (if there is one, and even if he doesn’t meet the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.S1oyWoM8sUgiazxK]{位阶要求}).

Modifiers

  • Additional Recipients (+1): The power may affect more than one target for 1 additional @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} each.

Zombie.name: 行尸
Zombie.description:
Zombie grants animation and basic intelligence to the remains of a once-living being. The summoned horror is obedient but literal-minded in its duties. It isn’t telepathic, and must be controlled by voice.

The being has the physical skills it had in life, but its @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{聪慧}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{心魂}, and related @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{技能} are reset to d4. A @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{优良} on the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.gLwCSlRUNAMQOJUi]{施法投骰} increases any one of their @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0Dc7wi6IydBRlBtJ]{特性} by one die type (caster’s choice).

Corpses aren’t summoned by this ability, so there must actually be a supply of bodies in @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.W0tCWhgTtmkp05G3]{射程} (GM’s call).

An undead @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{无力化} by damage can’t be raised with this power again.

Modifiers

  • Additional Zombies (+1): A larger horde can be raised in a single casting by paying an additional 1 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{奇术点} for each extra zombie raised.
  • Armed (+1 per Zombie): The dead rise with a rusting weapon common to their setting and environment. Choose one:
    • Hand Weapon: Str+d6
    • Ranged Weapon: Range 12/24/48, Dmg 2d6
  • Armor (+1 per Zombie): The horrors crawl from their grave wearing 2 points of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.jLuL7VxHiVRDqOHO]{护甲}. This might be old chain mail, rusting plate, rotting bulletproof vests, etc.
  • Mind Rider (+1): The caster can communicate and sense through one of the undead he's conjured. If it's destroyed, he may jupm to any of the others currently under his control.
  • Permanent (0): The zombie is given unlife until @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.30TJKevSbgxK6jQy]{无力化} by Wounds. The @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.I3euc03IC9TAW83S]{获得奇术点} used to raise it are "invested" and unavailable until it's destroyed. The necromancer may terminate his creations' unlife at any time, regardless of sight, distance, or other factors. His Power Points then begin recharging normally. Permanent zombies remain animated even if their creator is slain!

 

Zombie Creatures

Animals and other creatures can also be raised with this foul ability! The cost is 2 for a creature of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.mbP0fwcquD98QtwX]{体型} -1 or -2, 3 for @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.mbP0fwcquD98QtwX]{体型} 0, and 1 for a Small @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-bestiary.gEli0Fp96UrC5yug]{集群}, 2 for a Medium Swarm, or 3 for a Large Swarm.

Larger creatures cost 3 + @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.mbP0fwcquD98QtwX]{体型} in Power Points. For example, an undead grizzly (Size 2) costs 5 Power Points to raise.

Magical or supernatural @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.BrNK7u9mflAdnHzp]{特殊能力} aren’t conferred to the undead form, but those inherent to the creature are, such as @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-edges.qCULTUzDesDoGxZ6]{精通连击}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Oy34lVkZJFE8uNrt]{触及}, a swarm’s attack, etc.

Additional zombie creatures cost half their base cost if raised at once, instead of the +1 listed for Additional Zombies (round up, minimum of 1).

 

Zombie

These walking dead are typical groaning fiends looking for fresh meat.

Attributes: Agility d6, Smarts d4, Spirit d4, Strength d6, Vigor d6

Skills: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.sAig03GZiFKqBX7p]{运动} d4, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.wWiwjPlzAQU3TN9l]{格斗} d6, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.RrgAZp50CgQyyY6w]{威吓} d6, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.yvw9bMgsrWQXuZN2]{察觉} d4, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.sOHfVvBDhe3Oy3r1]{射击} d6

Pace: 4; Parry: 5; Toughness: 7

Edges: —

Special Abilities:

  • Bite/Claws: Str.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.PB0IgKbXwake0R3d]{无畏}: Zombies are immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.0kDGRsQ4SHyweFRc]{恐惧} and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.RrgAZp50CgQyyY6w]{威吓}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.tQYmftBKYoEGR35j]{不死生物}: +2 Toughness; +2 to recover from being Shaken; no additional damage from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.OpzGhU3fssihv5ds]{定点攻击}; ignores 1 point of Wound penalties; doesn’t breathe; immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.5n806Gfv7FpIbpWh]{疾病} and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.492TZ3ZhWD452C3O]{毒素}.
  • Weakness (Head): @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.OpzGhU3fssihv5ds]{定点攻击} to a zombie’s head do the usual +4 damage.
Zombie.trapping: Carving symbols on corpses, throwing bones, graveyards, "leather" books
